content: The boss fight against the Feng-Tail General is more of a skill check than anything, testing out whether you've got the necessary health and stamina to continue.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Verdant Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Feng-Tail General'.
The content is as follows:
The boss fight against the Feng-Tail General is more of a skill check than anything, testing out whether you've got the necessary health and stamina to continue.
